page.title: 16Atmosphere.
page.content: Kerry,Karen,Sarah and Shaun inteviewed an old man. He has been living in Blockley for 78 years and he said he liked the people in Blockley and he said he was born in Blockley. He was born at Dovedale. He said there are not enough shops and that he felt that there was too much vandalisamin the Country. Then we interviewed Denise Taylor and she has been living in Blockley for all her life and it is nice and peaceful. She said there are not enough services nor enough shops and she said she liked Blockley better when it had more shops. She thought the people in Blockley were friendly and thatBlockley shoud be kept tidy. Then we interviewed Sue Hill and she has been living in Blockley all her life.
